price: 6. Waarlijk! Wij hebben de nabije hemel met sterren versierd.
arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: innā zayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bizīnatin al-kawākibi
